title: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in Java editor
description: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in Java editor.
OB: When selecting 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the Java editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original, even after answering 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog. This behavior occurs after double-clicking on the file in the navigator to reopen it.
EB: Reverting the file contents should not take longer than closing and reopening the file.
SR:
1. Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog.
2. Double-click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2.
4. Select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor.
5. Observe the time it takes to replace the contents of the window with the original.
